name: metadata
description: Utilities for reading and writing the metadata of JavaScript functions.

classes.name: Metadata
classes.description: Provides helpers for working with metadata.

classes.name: Origin
classes.description: A metadata annotation that describes the origin module of the function to which it's attached.

params.name: moduleMember
params.description: The name of the export in the origin module.

methods.description: Get the Origin annotation for the specified function.
methods.name: get

params.name: fn
params.description: The function to inspect for Origin metadata.

methods.description: Set the Origin annotation for the specified function.
methods.name: set

params.name: fn
params.description: The function to set the Origin metadata on.

params.name: fn
params.description: The Origin metadata to store on the function.
